data.title: Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
data.text:
Vanessa Anne Hudgens (born December 14, 1988) is an American actress and singer. She is most well known for starring in High School Musical, High School Musical 2 and High School Musical 3: Senior Year on Disney Channel. She has won many awards and has been nominated since High School Musical. She has been on many TV shows and movies. She began acting and singing at an early age. Hudgens married MLB shortstop Cole Tucker on December 2, 2023.[1] In July 2024, Hudgens gave birth to her first child.[2]

Early life[change | change source]

Hudgens was born in Salinas, California, and has lived with her parents along the West Coast, from Oregon to Southern California. Her mother, Gina (née Guangco), held a succession of office jobs, and her father, Gregory Hudgens, was a firefighter. She has a younger sister, Stella Hudgens, who is also an actress.[3] She was raised as a Roman Catholic.[4] Her father is of English ancestry, and her mother, a native of Manila, Philippines, is of Filipino ancestry.[5][6] All of her grandparents were musicians.

Discography[change | change source]

V (2006)

Identified (2008)

Tours[change | change source]

The Party's Just Begun Tour (2006)

High School Musical: The Concert (2006/2007)

Identified Summer Tour (2008)
